title: Salmon Cookies
author: Cayla Zabel
body: Gives both the client a front and back end look at their business of Salmon Cookie Sales. The front end is customer friendly which includes history of the business, locations, and merchandise to be purchased. The back end is for the client to see which allows them to see the total daily sales for the day, which hours sell how many cookies, and how many cookies each location sells. It also allows the client to use a form to put in prosepctive locations and see how sales might be.

title: Bus Mall
author: Cayla Zabel
body: Bus mall is used as a servey for the general public who might use public transportation. It goes through and bank of images which are shown to the user and they are to choose which product they are most likely to buy.

title: Find Sam
author: Cayla Zabel, Remil Marzan, Khalid Mohamud, Adrian Valmont
body: A memory game built for a 201 final project at Code Fellows. The game allows the user to enter a username, play the game and then see a leaderboard which displays high scores. This game also included an about us for the deveopers of the game.
